description:
Love it, needs to be able to save to .STL and .STEP as a minimum to begin.
Will be watching, thanks for the program.

Best regards!

The IMPORT files function is closed off...

And like most clueless technical people - there is no upfront listing of compatabilities either - even if the import function was working.

The manual is only available ONLINE - Like your downloading nearly a a GIG of data, what is wrong with 5 or 10 meg more of manual, instead of having to go online all the time.

The usual excuses to not do this are that the manual will be out of date, well so is the software it was written for - idiots of the Open Sores movement.

This is a great improvement to the original FreeCAD.

It is much user friendly to those who are more familiar with Solidworks type of CAD software.

Please keep on developing. It is promising to be a very helpful tool for design engineers. I appreciate your time and effort.
